title: I'm Too Sexy To Have Male Friends
itunes:title: I'm Too Sexy To Have Male Friends
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I have a problem with how men see me. I was married for 25 years and I got divorced three years ago and decided to move to another state for a clean slate. I’m not looking for a serious relationship right now, I want to enjoy being single a while, but I would like male companionship occasionally. So here is my problem..........

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
